bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Roman Bakchias: Results and Perspectives.

series.title: Culture and History of the Ancient Near East.

bibl.title: Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008
bibl.author: PERNIGOTTI, Sergio

bibl.note: Survey and excavations led by the University of Bologna since 1993: the earliest archaeological traces, the temples, a large granary, the public baths.
PERNIGOTTI Sergio, Archaeological Research in Roman Bakchias: Results and Perspectives.

Katja LEMBKE, Martina MINAS-NERPEL and Stefan PFEIFFER (Edd.), Tradition and Transformation: Egypt under Roman Rule. Proceedings of the International Conference, Hildesheim, Roemer- and Pelizaeus-Museum, 3-6 July 2008 = Culture and History of the Ancient Near East. 41 (Leiden, 2010) pp. 299-311, 6 figg.
